title: Should we watch the Golden Globes? | What's the Story?
description:
Hollywood award shows are rigged by the industry, so why should we watch them? In the age of endless streamable content, are award shows becoming obsolete?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
